title: Campfire Coffee
detail: A project in CodeFellows 201 that required an output based on a random value based on a minimum and maximum input, as well as allowing the user to input data for a new coffe location.

title: Bus Mall Catalog
detail: A project in CodeFellows 201 where a hypothetical client requested to test various products for user preference.  The results were stored over time in local storage to keep track of the results for users over time.  Also, there was a check in place to ensure users were given a random result that wasn't duplicate of any other images.

title: Cliquor Cabinet
detail: A group project where we created a list of drinks based on a user's ingredients that are stored on local storage.  If the user does put in a drink, it'll be added to a database.  Once the user has their ingredients in, they can display drinks in the databased that are sorted based on what percentage of ingredients in the drink they have.  Additionally, it can be sorted by based liqour or various categories.
